about:
- I'm a passionate React.js developer with experience in building high-quality web applications. I enjoy solving complex problems and building scalable and efficient applications using React.js.
- **My expertise includes:**
 -Building reusable and maintainable components using React.js.
	 -Using state management libraries like Redux to manage application state.
	 -Integrating with backend APIs using tools like Axios and Fetch
	 -Writing clean and efficient code to ensure fast page load times.
- I believe in continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in React.js development.

`Strive to build things that make a difference!` - Alyani
